sourcesContent: /* eslint-disable @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any */ import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-file-upload', templateUrl: './file-upload.component.html', styleUrls: ['./file-upload.component.css'], }) export class FileUploadComponent { routeName: string = ''; invalidFileFormat: boolean = false; checkFileFormat(file: File, format: String): void { if (file.type !== `.${format}`) { this.invalidFileFormat = true; } else { this.invalidFileFormat = false; } } }
